paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: The paper discusses the reclassification of BRCA1/2 variants, specifically focusing on BRCA2 variants with functional and clinical significance.

functional_data.summary: The likely pathogenic assertion of BRCA2:c.8487G>T was reinforced based on its spliceogenic property and tumor LOH.

variants.additional_notes: The variant was not previously reported.
key_quotes: The likely pathogenic assertion of previously not reported BRCA2:c.8487G>T was reinforced based on its spliceogenic property and tumor LOH.

functional_data.summary: BRCA2:c.793G>A failed to present aberrant splicing in spite of suggestive predictions, which altered its original VUS evaluation into likely benign class.

variants.additional_notes: The variant was previously classified as VUS.
key_quotes: BRCA2:c.793G>A failed to present aberrant splicing in spite of suggestive predictions, which altered its original VUS evaluation into likely benign class.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant BRCA2 variants were extracted from the text.
